description.project_collaborator_management: Manage collaborators for your projects. Add, remove, or change roles for different projects.
description.manage_project_collaborators_owner: As the project owner, you can manage collaborators, set their roles, and control access.
description.manage_project_collaborators_member: You are a collaborator on this project. View the project's collaborator list.

description.project_collaborator_management: 管理專案的協作者權限。您可以為不同專案添加、移除協作者或變更其角色。
description.manage_project_collaborators_owner: 作為專案擁有者，您可以管理協作者、設定其角色並控制存取權限。
description.manage_project_collaborators_member: 您是此專案的協作者。查看專案的協作者列表。
